goal: Create _manifest_helpers.py with helper functions for manifest creation: parse_artifacts_json, sanitize_goal_for_filename, and generate_validation_command

contains.name: parse_artifacts_json
contains.description: Parse JSON artifacts string from CLI argument into list of artifact dictionaries

contains.name: sanitize_goal_for_filename
contains.description: Convert goal string to safe filename component (lowercase, hyphens, truncated)

contains.name: generate_validation_command
contains.description: Generate pytest or vitest validation command based on file type and task number
